query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS task_comments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  taskId INT NOT NULL,
  employeeId INT NOT NULL,
  comment TEXT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FfdjCLoumdFxBM.c17094cb1ee7 --database ThTAtwhLC93Gu4TaZSL8s7 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS task_comments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  taskId INT NOT NULL,
  employeeId INT NOT NULL,
  comment TEXT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
